title: ePSXe for Android v1.9.20
description:
It is a port from the famous ePSXe for PC. ePSXe provides high compatibility and good speed. It is designed for smartphones and tablets, including a fun 2 players option for tablets using split screen mode.

What's New
Version 1.9.20
* Added multi-threading support to OpenGL plugin mode. 3 modes added: 2-threads + extra effects. Enable extra effects in fast phones to adding effects (ex: swirls in ff series). (http://epsxe.com/files/libopenglpluginv5.so)
* Updated the pad skins thanks to Javier ~ X1673
* Better detection incomplete/corrupted PS1 Bios
* Detection of requiring SBI files in gamelist
* Fixes some crashes on exit
* Added a mode to play using other smartphone (in local wifi) as gamepad for player2

This app has NO advertisements
